verses.verse: And to the announcer of the assembly in Sardis, write, "The One who has the seven spirits of God and the seven stars says the things here, 'I have seen your actions, that you have the name that you live, and you are dead.
Become a person who stays awake and establish the rest of the things that are going to die. You see, I haven't found your actions that have been accomplished in the sight of God.

So remember how you have received and heard; keep guard; and change your ways. So if you don't stay awake, I will arrive upon you as a thief, and you won't in any way know which hour I will arrive upon you.
You have a few names even in Sardis that didn't dirty their clothes. And they will traipse around with Me in white because they are deserving.

The person who conquers, this person will put on white robes around himself. And I won't in any way erase his name from the scroll of the life, and I will acknowledge his name out loud in the sight of My Father and in the sight of His angels.
The person who has an ear must hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies.'"

And to the announcer of the assembly in Philadelphia, write, "The sacred One, the true One, the One who has the key of David, the One who opens and no one closes and who closes and no one opens, says the things here,

'I have seen your actions. Look, in your sight I have given a door having been opened and no one is able to close it because you have little ability, you kept My message, and you did not deny My name.

Look, I am giving you some from the synagogue of the Opponent (the people saying for themselves to be Jewish, and they are not, but they are lying). Look, I will make them so that they will arrive and bow down in the sight of your feet. And they will know that I loved you.

Because you kept the message of My persistence to do what is right, I also will keep you from the hour of the trouble, the hour that is going to be coming on the whole civilized world to trouble the people residing on the earth.
Look, I am coming quickly. Hold on to what you have so that no one might take your award wreath.

The person who conquers, I will make him a pillar in the temple of My God, and he will not in any way go outside anymore. And I will write on him the name of My God, the name of the city of My God, the New Jerusalem (the one stepping down from the sky out of My God), and My name, the new name.
The person who has an ear must hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies.'"
And to the announcer of the assembly of Laodiceans, write, "The Amen, the Witness, the trustable and true Witness, the Beginning of the creation of God, says the things here,
'I have seen your actions, that you are neither cold, nor hot. I would like it if you were cold or hot.
This is why (because you are lukewarm and neither cold, nor hot) I am going to vomit you from my mouth
because you say, 'I am rich, I have been rich, and I have need of nothing,' and you have not seen that you are the troubled, miserable, poor, blind, and naked person.

Together with others I advise to you to buy from the side of Me gold that has been refined from fire (so that you might be rich), white robes (so that you might put them around yourself and the shame of your nakedness might not be shown), and eye-salve to anoint in your eyes (so that you might see).
However many that I am fond of, I reprimand and discipline. So be impassioned and change your ways.
Look, I have been standing at the door, and I am knocking. If anyone listens to My voice and opens the door, I will come in to him, eat dinner with him, and he with Me.
The person who conquers, I will give him the right to be seated with Me in My throne, as I also conquered and was seated with My Father in His throne.
The person who has an ear must hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies.'"
